ceo_buyer.justification: For further information contact: Mr David Mason Mr Craig McPherson Chief Executive Officer Company Secretary...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: ...to purchase all of the shares in AusVan from the Vendors...

currency.justification: The consideration to be paid to the Vendors for the acquisition... is AUD$5,000,000 worth of NewPeak shares...

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration is specified only as shares; no cash component is mentioned as part of the acquisition consideration.

share_payments_raw.justification: The consideration to be paid... is AUD$5,000,000 worth of NewPeak shares...

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as an explicit share payment value is provided (Priority 1).

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: ...being a total of 303,030,303 NewPeak shares at an issue price of $0.0165...

issued_share_price.justification: ...at an issue price of $0.0165 (1.65 cents) per NewPeak share...

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: Future exploration plans are mentioned, but no specific meterage is defined as a contractual commitment in the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: A 'Rights Issue' to fund future exploration is mentioned, but it is a separate capital raising event, not a commitment within the acquisition's deal terms.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Additional exploration drilling, scout exploration drilling, and metallurgical test work.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: NewPeak intends to conduct exploration... The exploration program would include: 1. Additional exploration drilling... 2. Further scout exploration drilling... 3. Additional metallurgical test work...

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty is mentioned as part of this transaction's terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: AusVan holds 6 granted Exploration Permits for Minerals (EPM) and 1 EPM application comprising a total of 468 sub-blocks covering 1,498 square kilometres...

resource_size_desc.value: 710 million tonnes of vanadium mineral resource, at 0.46 V2O5 (wt%)
resource_size_desc.justification: ...has an Inferred JORC Resource of 710 million tonnes of vanadium mineral resource, at 0.46 V2O5 (wt%) in the prominent Julia Creek vanadium province...

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: NewPeak Metals Ltd (ASX:NPM) (NPM, NewPeak or the Company) is pleased to announce that it has executed a binding term sheet...
